eapli.framework.util

Class DateTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • eapli.framework.util.DateTime

  • public final class DateTime
extends Object
    utility class for Calendar manipulation and several date and time related functions.
    Author:
    Paulo Gandra Sousa

        public static Calendar newCalendar(int year,
                                   int month,
                                   int day)
        Creates a new Calendar object set to a specific date
        Parameters:
        year - the year
        month - the month (1 - 12). note that the Calendar class uses months from 0 to 11, not 1 to 12
        day - the day of the month
        Returns:
        a newly create Calendar object

        public static boolean isBefore(Calendar a,
                               Calendar b)
        checks if the calendar date (Year, Month and Day) is before the other calendar.
        Parameters:
        a - The one calendar.
        b - The other calendar.
        Returns:

      • isUntil

        public static boolean isUntil(Calendar a,
                              Calendar b)
        checks if the calendar date (Year, Month and Day) is before the other calendar or both have the same date.
        Parameters:
        a - The one calendar.
        b - The other calendar.
        Returns:
        It returns "true" if the one calendar is before/equal the other calendar or "false" otherwise.
